pilots.name: 212th Battalion Pilot
pilots.text: Capable of functioning in space assaults and atmospheric battles alike, the LAAT/i gunship transports Republic troops to battlefronts on planets besieged by the Separatists.

shipability.name: Fire Ordinance
shipability.text: While a friendly ship performs a non-[Single Turret Arc], if the defender is in your turret arc you may spend 1 charge token, if you do the attacker may reroll up to 2 results.
